name: Money Seeker
description:
This game was made by Team Melon for Datorium Summer Game Jam 2022!

Venture in a casino and spend money on a lottery machine to get as much money as possible to win! But definitely be sure not to lose all of it and get into debt!

Danial Jumagaliyev Director, Game Designer, Programmer PxlDev Generalist (Environment and Character artist, Music and SFX Designer,  Level Design, Game Designer, Web Page Designer)OmmtdhCasino art, Cutscene art Fully RenderedProgrammer Movement WASD and Arrow keys InteractingSpace keyMining / AttackingSpace keyPauseP key or Escape key Windows Build:

Softlocking bugA game breaking bug, where if you talk to a specific NPC,
your game softlocks itself.

The only found ways to continue from this point if encountered, is to: Pause Menu > Main Menu > Continue.

After this you should be able to continue from where you left.
